dct_alternative_sm: Map of the war against Great Britain
dct_description_sm: Druck und Verlag Cratander A.G. Basel. Zeichnung ,,RAB" Reklame Atelier Basel (K. Meister).
Shows borders, major waterways and cities, distances (in km) between various points on the British Isles and the mainland.
Map description in German; title (on panel) also in French, with larger scale map of the same area.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
